complaint.fullInstructions: âš¡ï¸ Quick complaint submission. â„¹ï¸ To submit a scam complaint, you must first gather the following data: 1. Scammer's Username or Telegram ID. 2. Situation description [500 character limit] 3. Photo / Video proving the scam [from 2 to 10 media files] â€¼ï¸ Submitting a complaint that does not match the form or complaints containing potential spam with the aim of harming or slowing down the complaint service, leads to a ban on submitting complaints, blocking in the bot, or addition to the database of suspicious participants. ğŸ”¸ By clicking "Fill out Form", you automatically agree to the rules above.
